name: Snakes and Ladders (itch)
description:
Based on the classic board game!

When I was young, my dad and I started making a Snakes and Ladders game using Visual Basic, but because I was so young I eventually lost interest. Still, that time with my dad planted the seed that made me want to make games someday. So now, decades later, I decided to finish that game for my dad's birthday. 

I hope you enjoy!

Happy birthday Dad!
